code: export var CREATE_TOPIC='CREATE_TOPIC';export var DELETE_TOPIC='DELETE_TOPIC';export var FIND_ALL_TOPICS_FOR_LESSON='FIND_ALL_TOPICS_FOR_LESSON';export var UPDATE_TOPIC='UPDATE_TOPIC';export var createTopic=function createTopic(topic){return{type:CREATE_TOPIC,newTopic:topic};};export var deleteTopic=function deleteTopic(topicId){return{type:DELETE_TOPIC,topicId:topicId};};export var findAllTopicsForLesson=function findAllTopicsForLesson(topics){return{type:FIND_ALL_TOPICS_FOR_LESSON,topics:topics};};export var updateTopic=function updateTopic(topic){return{type:UPDATE_TOPIC,topic:topic};};export default{CREATE_TOPIC:CREATE_TOPIC,DELETE_TOPIC:DELETE_TOPIC,FIND_ALL_TOPICS_FOR_LESSON:FIND_ALL_TOPICS_FOR_LESSON,UPDATE_TOPIC:UPDATE_TOPIC,deleteTopic:deleteTopic,createTopic:createTopic,findAllTopicsForLesson:findAllTopicsForLesson,updateTopic:updateTopic};
